00022 #include "cimunit_schedule.h"

00024 #include <stdio.h>

00028 cimunit_schedule_t *cimunit_schedule_init() {
00029     cimunit_schedule_t *schedule = malloc(sizeof(cimunit_schedule_t));
00030     cimunit_mutex_init(&schedule->mutex, NULL);
00031     cimunit_thread_table_init(&(schedule->thread_table)); 
00032     schedule->event_list = cimunit_event_list_init();
00033     cimunit_event_table_init(&schedule->fired_event_list, &(schedule->thread_table));
00034     schedule->schedule_string = NULL;
00035 
00036     return schedule;
00037 }
00038 
00039 
00040 void cimunit_schedule_destroy(cimunit_schedule_t *schedule) {
00041     cimunit_event_list_t *event_list = schedule->event_list;
00042 
00043     cimunit_thread_table_destroy(&(schedule->thread_table));
00044     
00045     while(event_list) {
00046         cimunit_event_destroy(event_list->event);
00047         event_list = event_list->next;
00048     }
00049     cimunit_event_list_destroy(&schedule->event_list);
00050     
00051     free(schedule->schedule_string);
00052 }
00053 
00054 
00055 BOOL cimunit_schedule_fire(struct cimunit_schedule *schedule,
00056                            const char *eventName)
00057 {
00058     const char *thread_name;
00059     cimunit_event_t *event;
00060     const cimunit_event_list_t *next_action;
00061 
00062     if (!schedule) {
00063       return FALSE;
00064     }
00065     
00066     thread_name = cimunit_schedule_get_thread_name(schedule,
00067                                                    cimunit_thread_self());
00068 
00069     event = cimunit_event_list_find_with_thread(schedule->event_list,
00070                                                 eventName, thread_name); 
00071       
00072     if (!event) {
00073         event = cimunit_event_list_find(schedule->event_list, eventName);
00074     }
00075     if (event) {
00076         cimunit_add_event_to_table(&schedule->fired_event_list, event, NULL);
00077 
00078         next_action = cimunit_event_get_action_list(event);
00079       
00080         // When the event is fired, open the barriers associated with this event.
00081         // e.x.  a->b   fire_event('a') causes the barrier associated with 'b' to
00082         // be unlocked.
00083         while(next_action) {
00084             if (cimunit_schedule_parse_runtime(
00085                   schedule, next_action->event->event_name,
00086                   next_action->event->thread_name)) {
00087                 cimunit_barrier_unlock(&(next_action->event->condition_barrier));
00088             }
00089             next_action = next_action->next;
00090         }
00091       
00092         if (event->is_action) {
00093             cimunit_barrier_wait(&(event->condition_barrier));
00094         }
00095     } else {
00096         return FALSE;
00097     }
00098     
00099     return TRUE;
00100 }

00103 void cimunit_schedule_set_thread_name(cimunit_schedule_t *schedule,
00104                                       cimunit_thread_t thread,
00105                                       const char *threadName)
00106 {
00107     if (!schedule) {
00108       return;
00109     }
00110     cimunit_mutex_lock(&schedule->mutex);
00111     cimunit_set_thread_name(&schedule->thread_table, thread, threadName);                                      
00112     cimunit_mutex_unlock(&schedule->mutex);
00113 }
00114 
00115 
00116 const char *cimunit_schedule_get_thread_name(cimunit_schedule_t *schedule,
00117                                              cimunit_thread_t thread)
00118 {
00119     const char *thread_name;
00120     
00121     if (!schedule) {
00122       return NULL;
00123     }
00124     
00125     cimunit_get_thread_name(&schedule->thread_table, thread, &thread_name);
00126 
00127     return thread_name;
00128 }
